metadata.description: Inventory - REQUIRED. Environment, including geographic location, for Power Automate - Ex for commercial: https://flow.microsoft.com/manage/environments/

value.QuestionName: Will you be using AI models in your app?
value.KeepInMind: Does your app need to scan, read and save information from PDFs or images? Will you need to recognize and count things in images? Will you need to categorize text by its meaning or predict whether something will happen based on historic data?

value.QuestionName: How many steps are in your workflow?
Will you be developing a multi-step business process?
value.KeepInMind: Will you guide people through a step by step process that leads users through the process you have defined for actions that need to be done?

value.QuestionName: Does the app need to work offline?
Does your app need to support multiple languages?

Do you require hierarchical security?
value.KeepInMind: For example, if storing sales data - do you need to implement security where the Head Office can see all sales, the Sales team in the US can only see their sales, and the Sales team in Europe can only see their sales.

value.QuestionName: Do you require field level security?
value.KeepInMind: Do you need to hide specific fields from specific individuals or teams?

value.QuestionName: Do you need row level security?
value.KeepInMind: Do you need to hide specific fields from specific individuals or teams?

value.QuestionName: What are your reporting requirements?
value.KeepInMind: Do you need simple reports with non-real-time data or do you need advance reporting with strong security requirements?

value.QuestionName: How complex is your data model?
value.KeepInMind: How many tables do you have?  Do they have relationships?
